meanings.definition: Having a specified type of complexion.
meanings.sent1: She is fair-complexioned with rosy cheeks.
meanings.sent2: The model has a dark-complexioned skin tone.
meanings.sent3: The fair-complexioned girl blushed when she received a compliment.
meanings.sent4: Her complexioned face shone brightly under the sun.
meanings.sent5: The baby's fair-complexioned skin was as smooth as silk.

meanings.definition: Having a specified number or type of complexions.
meanings.sent1: The triplets were differently complexioned, making them easy to tell apart.
meanings.sent2: The actors were variously complexioned to fit their roles in the movie.
meanings.sent3: The rainbow was complexioned with vibrant colors after the rain.
meanings.sent4: The forest was complexioned with a mix of green shades in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The flowers were complexioned in a beautiful array of hues in the garden.
